Entries.Sun10: I've a good many cozy areas in the house.$u#$b#Pick whichever you like.
Entries.Sat10: At least allow me to attend to my duties ere you seek to distract me.$7#$e#Honestly, you are ridiculous.$1
Entries.summer_Sun4_1: After over a season of your pestering, I have to wonder if your refusal to leave me alone is born not of ignorance, but spite.$6
Entries.winter_Sat10: About now there's nothing I'd like better than to forgo work and laze about.$6#$b#Should the spirit of sloth take you as well, at least fetch me a snack before you settle in.

Entries.Sun10: I've a good many cozy areas in the house to experience, each with their own appeal for lazing on.$u#$b#Pick whichever you like.$u
Entries.Sat10: At least allow me to attend to my duties ere you seek to drag me from work.$7#$e#Honestly, you are ridiculous.
Entries.summer_Sun4_1: I must admit, your tenacity in seeking my time is impressive. Truly you are fazed by little.
Entries.winter_Sat10: About now there's nothing I'd like better than to forgo work and laze about.$6#$b#Should the spirit of sloth take you as well, at least fetch me a snack before you settle in.
Entries.Tue10: And so, a new week of tasks begins.#$e#But if I left my work for any longer than a day or two, I would only start to worry what crisis would greet me upon my return.$6
Entries.Thu10: How you find the time and energy to run about the mountains after a day's farmwork mystifies me.#$b#Simply watching you is enough to exhaust me.
Entries.spring_Sun8: At last, weather where any time spent outside is not an exercise in misery.
Entries.spring_Tue8: Have you tried your hand at growing flowers, by any chance?#$e#I may be convinced to provide seeds from the clematis out front, if it would interest you.
Entries.spring_15: Even having seen him again, this day never gets easier to bear.$9#$e#Still... I am sure he would much rather be remembered for his joys than watch me sulk.#$b#Perhaps I can share some of his bolder moments of general mischief.$1
Entries.summer_Mon10: ...'Tis a humbling sight, the aether of the mountain and its denizens in full bloom.$1
Entries.summer_Wed10: Ah, @. I understand the desire for refuge from the overbearing summer heat.#$e#Let in any insects and you will be thrown back outside, however.$6
Entries.summer_Fri8: You've encountered nothing else out of the ordinary, I hope.#$e#I would not be surprised if some other crisis manifests so soon, but I would be impressed.$6
Entries.fall_Thu8: Will you be setting aside any produce for vinification this season?#$b#The valley produces some lovely wines.$1
Entries.fall_Sat8: You didn't happen to bring espresso as part of your daily offering, did you?#$b#Much remains to be done this eve; were it not for the texture, I would contemplate consuming the grounds of my last batch.$6
Entries.winter_1: And so the colors of fall inevitably fade to the bleakness of winter.#$b#If you have need of me, I will be attempting to force my body to adopt a state of dormancy.#$e#It is a flaw in design that we are not obligate hibernators, in my opinion.$8
Entries.winter_21: ...Hm?#$e#...Azem would have been delighted to meet you, I'm sure.$9#$b#A kindred spirit in romping around the outdoors and unearthing trouble, no doubt.$6
Entries.winter_Wed8: How bored you must be, to trudge through the snow for a visit.#$e#Should you turn to the mines to relieve you of winter's torpor, at least take a measure of precaution.$6[668]#$e#If nothing else, it will save me the trouble of having to wrest you from peril again.$7

Entries.Emet-Selch: They are beautiful, are they not? Yet I fear this will be one more sight lost to time.#$e#...Never mind my ramblings. I should be glad for this evening.$9

350/playSound stoneStep/pause 350/playSound stoneStep/pause 500/speak Emet-Selch "Now how does the Underworld fare today...$8"/pause 500/speak Emet-Selch "...@? @!$11"/pause 250/playSound Emet-Selch 15 7/faceDirection Emet-Selch 2/faceDirection farmer 2/eyes 1 -10000/viewport 18 8 true/globalFadeToClear 0.005 continue/pause 1000/move Emet-Selch 0 3 2/pause 1000/move Emet-Selch 0 -3 0/pause 500/eyes 4 -10000/pause 200/faceDirection Emet-Selch 1/pause 200/emote Emet-Selch 16/pause 900/move Emet-Selch 1 0 1/pause 500/speak Emet-Selch "Finally, you decide to wake.$6#$b#How are you feeling?"/quickQuestion How are you?#Not great.#I could be better, but I think I'll be okay now.#Not bad, considering I passed out!(break)speak Emet-Selch "Yes, I would imagine so.$0"(break)speak Emet-Selch "...About the best you could hope for, considering what you went through.$0"(break)speak Emet-Selch "Do you have any idea-!$6#$b#...$9"/pause 300/faceDirection Emet-Selch 2/pause 200/speak Emet-Selch "It would appear concentrations of aether in portions of the mine have become so low, crystals within the rock draw in any that comes near.$0"/pause 200/faceDirection Emet-Selch 1/pause 200/speak Emet-Selch "In this case, yours. I found you on the cavern floor, near-drained of aether.$6"/pause 300/speak Emet-Selch "If I hadn't chanced to find you...$0#$b#You would not have survived.$6"/pause 400/faceDirection Emet-Selch 2/pause 700/speak Emet-Selch "Have I not told you I've laid enough reckless souls to rest..!!$2"/pause 300/faceDirection Emet-Selch 1/pause 100/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move Emet-Selch -1 0 1/speak Emet-Selch "...$2"/pause 800/faceDirection Emet-Selch 2/pause 800/speak Emet-Selch "...$9"/pause 200/speak Emet-Selch "I've replenished your aether with my own, but you're like to feel weak for a time.$0#$b#Rest for the night, will you.$9"/pause 300/move Emet-Selch 0 2 2/pause 600/speak Emet-Selch "I will continue my search for the cause of such dramatic fluctuations.#$b#Do not count on your luck to see you through further forays. It will not last indefinitely.$6"/pause 900/advancedMove Emet-Selch false 0 1 -3 0 0 -5/end newDay

Entries.134360101/e 134360091/F /f Emet-Selch 25: none/8 8/farmer 10 14 3 Emet-Selch 7 9 0/addConversationTopic 13436_EmetDrama 7/skippable/move farmer -3 0 3/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 500/faceDirection Emet-Selch 2/pause 500/showFrame Emet-Selch 29/pause 800/textAboveHead Emet-Selch "..."/pause 900/speak Emet-Selch "...@. Once more, you invite yourself into my company.#$b#Tell me; what is it that brings you here, again and again?$0"/pause 600/emote farmer 32/pause 1200/speak Emet-Selch "...$s"/pause 200/speak Emet-Selch "...I see. You think us close.$0"/pause 400/faceDirection Emet-Selch 2/pause 300/speak Emet-Selch "You think yourself one whose visits I await, conversation I enjoy, counsel I value?"/pause 800/speak Emet-Selch "I had thought my feelings towards each and every one of you townspeople quite clear, but allow me to leave no room for doubt.#$b#I hold no desire for your companionship.$6"/pause 600/speak Emet-Selch "Yet *you* would presume yourself an exception.$u#$b#Do you honestly think I consider you my equal?$5"/pause 700/move Emet-Selch 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection Emet-Selch 2/pause 300/speak Emet-Selch "Oh, there were those I considered such.#$b#Those who I proudly stood beside as we worked to better our world.$0"/pause 300/speak Emet-Selch "There was Hythlodaeus, keen of eye and mind alike.$9#$b#$9Who turned down the seat of Emet-Selch, yet was never far when I had need of aid, no matter how his years wore on."/pause 200 /speak Emet-Selch "And when I all but begged him to accept the seat he had rejected, so that he might live on?$9"/pause 400/speak Emet-Selch "The stubborn fool refused it until the end.$s#$b# *Insisted* that I could do so much more for the world than he, that he would gladly accept his passing if it meant such would come to fruition.$s"/pause 300/speak Emet-Selch "And so he did."/pause 700/speak Emet-Selch "Azem, a most trusted friend on the Convocation, counselor to the people, always searching for those they might aid.$10"/pause 300/speak Emet-Selch "Ever thrusting themselves into greater and greater dangers for the sake of others, heedless of the risks they bore.$9#$b#Azem, who I fought aside countless times-$9#$b#Who gave their very life for the people they sought to protect.$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Emet-Selch 0/pause 700/speak Emet-Selch "I labored alongside them and countless more, the truest and most noble souls of generation upon generation.$s#$b#Watched them grow, learn, and--#$b#--be it through time or tragedy--#$b#--fade into naught but memory.$s"/pause 200/faceDirection Emet-Selch 2/pause 200/speak Emet-Selch "And I have had my fill of it.$5"/pause 300/speak Emet-Selch "There is nothing you can offer me, no reason you are deserving of my esteem.$10#$b#Now I suggest you deliberate, alone, until that is understood.$10"/quickQuestion Now I suggest you deliberate, alone, until that is understood.#I don't want to do that, and I don't think you do either.#...I see.#You've got it wrong. I don't consider you that close at all.(break)speak Emet-Selch "...Perhaps. But I will not suffer such again.$9"(break)speak Emet-Selch "...I'm sorry, @. But it is best I make myself clear here and now.$s"(break)speak Emet-Selch "...$11#$b#Excellent. I'm simply ensuring you know exactly where you stand.$u"/pause 300/speak Emet-Selch "Now, it is best you go.$n"/pause 2000/end invisible Emet-Selch

Entries.134360102/F/e 134360101/A 13436_EmetDram: Near The Planet Core/12 10/farmer 5 12 1 Emet-Selch 1 1 2 Soulseer 2 2 2/skippable/ambientLight 20 0 30/ignoreCollisions farmer/ignoreCollisions Emet-Selch/warp Emet-Selch -100 100/warp Soulseer -99 -99/move farmer 4 0 1/pause 100/playSound magma_sprite_spot/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 1200/glow 50 4 70 false/pause 100/addTemporaryActor Beaft 48 48 17 11 2 false/animate Beaft false true 200 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23/ignoreCollisions Beaft/playSound yoba/playSound coldSpell/glow 50 4 70 true/pause 100/emote farmer 16/pause 100/jump farmer 8/eyes 5 -10000/startJittering/pause 500/eyes 0 -10000/pause 200/move Beaft -3 0 2 true/playSound magma_sprite_spot/pause 1000/animate Beaft false true 200 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23/pause 1000/showFrame Emet-Selch 63/warp Emet-Selch 10 7 2/playSound wand/showFrame Emet-Selch 24/pause 100/showFrame Emet-Selch 25/pause 100/showFrame Emet-Selch 24/pause 100/showFrame Emet-Selch 25/pause 100/showFrame Emet-Selch 24/pause 100/showFrame Emet-Selch 24/pause 100/showFrame Emet-Selch 25/pause 100/showFrame Emet-Selch 24/pause 100/showFrame Emet-Selch 25/pause 100/showFrame Emet-Selch 26/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 0/jump farmer 5/showFrame Emet-Selch 27/pause 300/showFrame Emet-Selch 0/startJittering/pause 400/speak Emet-Selch "*There's* that aether-$6"/pause 100/speak Emet-Selch "-@!?$11#$b#Stand back! Don't you dare try to fight that thing!$5"/pause 100/speed Emet-Selch 4/move Emet-Selch 0 2 2/speed farmer 5/move farmer -3 0 1/speed farmer 3/startJittering/pause 1000/playSound flameSpellHit/pause 10/playSound wand/screenFlash 3/showFrame Emet-Selch 63/addTemporaryActor Emet-Selch-Transformed 128 64 6 9 2 false/animate Emet-Selch-Transformed false true 100 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7/pause 2000/speed Beaft 4/move Beaft -6 0 0/animate Beaft false true 200 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23/pause 1500/playSound swordswipe/jump Beaft 8/pause 50/screenFlash 1/playSound flameSpell/pause 1300/playSound swordswipe/jump Beaft 8/pause 50/screenFlash 1/playSound flameSpell/pause 1000/speak Emet-Selch "Enough of this.$12#$b#Away with you!$13"/pause 400/stopAnimation Emet-Selch-Transformed 9/pause 1000/playSound powerup/screenFlash 3/playSound serpentDie/warp Beaft -100 -100/addTemporaryActor Rift 32 32 11 10 2 false/showFrame Rift 0/stopMusic/pause 300/showFrame Rift 1/pause 400/showFrame Rift 2/pause 400/animate Rift false true 400 2 3/stopJittering/pause 1200/showFrame Emet-Selch-Transformed 0/pause 500/animate Emet-Selch-Transformed false true 100 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7/pause 3000/stopGlowing/playMusic winter1/pause 2500/speak Emet-Selch "Are you hurt?$12"/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 300/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 2 0 0/pause 100/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Emet-Selch "That was a departed soul, trapped in this realm.$12#$b# And the cause of my recent woes besides.$13#$b#It had to have drawn in massive quantities of aether to regain form as it did.$12"/pause 600/speak Emet-Selch "I opened a passage to the aetherial sea and bid it return; The rift will close soon enough.$12"/pause 200/speak Emet-Selch "Though I'm certain there was a pull from the other side as well...$13"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Rift "Oh! It's holding!"/pause 50/playSound dwoop/jump Emet-Selch-Transformed 8/pause 10/emote farmer 16/pause 100/pause 1800/stopAnimation Rift 3/pause 400/showFrame Rift 4/pause 400/showFrame Rift 5/pause 400/animate Rift false true 400 6 7/pause 1000/speak Soulseer "Theeeereee we are.$0"/pause 50/pause 200/speak Soulseer "An excellent show as always, my friend.$0#$b#And what a treat to see you in full form!$3"/pause 200/speak Emet-Selch "-Hythlodaeus! You're-$14"/speak Soulseer "Taking my time in the Underworld?$0#$b# Well of course. We can hardly go on to the next life without our dear Hades!$3"/pause 1000/warp Emet-Selch-Transformed -200 -200/showFrame Emet-Selch 24/warp Emet-Selch 9 9/animate Emet-Selch false false 100 25 26 25 25 26 27 27 0/playSound wand/pause 1000/move Emet-Selch 0 2 1/pause 300/move Emet-Selch 1 0 1/pause 300/speak Emet-Selch "You're still...$2"/speak Soulseer "Don't get the wrong idea, now. Azem and I are quite content to wait as long as we must.#$b#We wouldn't dream of keeping the most eminent Emet-Selch from his duties!$3"/speak Emet-Selch "Really, because I recall otherwi-$6"/speak Soulseer "Nonsense!$3#$b#But I do admit...#$b#I have some concerns to voice.$0"/pause 400/stopAnimation Rift 8/pause 400/animate Rift false true 400 9 8/speak Emet-Selch "Concerns?$0"/pause 200/speak Soulseer "For you, love.$1#$b#I do try and see how you fare, when such glimpses are afforded to me.$1"/pause 300/speak Soulseer "To see you hurt, watch you refuse yourself any happiness... it's terrible.$1#$b#You've been left alone for so long, and for that I am sorry.$1"/pause 400/speak Soulseer "But please, don't let that be reason to deny any connection, fleeting though it may be.$1"/pause 100/speak Soulseer "Such wonderful things will pass, yes.$1#$b#But that is true regardless of if they are experienced... or forsaken.$1"/pause 400/speak Soulseer "And given the choice... I would much rather see you embrace them.$0"/pause 400/speak Soulseer "So please, go and live a little. Share in all life has to offer!$3#$b#I suspect you have an interested party close at hand, after all.$1"/pause 1000/speak Soulseer "With that, I suppose I should get going. It was lovely meeting you, @.$0#$b#Do take care of our Emet-Selch, would you?$3"/speak Emet-Selch "Hythlodaeus!$11"/speak Soulseer "Now now, I said I wouldn't interfere with your good work.#$b#Just as well, for there is a newly-arrived 'errant soul' here that could use a touch of help.#$b#I may not carry a title, but surely that is just as worthy a cause to attend to?"/pause 300/faceDirection Emet-Selch 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Emet-Selch "..."/pause 2000/textAboveHead Emet-Selch "*sigh*"/pause 2000/faceDirection Emet-Selch 1/pause 200/speak Emet-Selch "Of course the one time I wish you *would* interrupt my day with chatter is the one time you find your own work to do.$1"/speak Soulseer "You wish for my 'chatter', do you? I shall have to remember that when next you claim otherwise.$2#$b#After all...with a flow of so much aether, I suspect the path between realms may persist for a time. But I digress.$0"/pause 200/speak Soulseer "Until next we meet.$0"/playSound dwop/jump Emet-Selch 3/speak Emet-Selch "Of course I wish-$2"/pause 200/speak Emet-Selch "...$9#$b#Until next we meet.$1"/pause 2000/stopAnimation Rift 1/pause 500/playSound powerup/showFrame Rift 0/pause 500/warp Rift -150 -150/pause 1500/faceDirection Emet-Selch 2/pause 900/speak Emet-Selch "@.$0#$b#Go home and rest.$0#$b#I'll disperse any remaining aether.$9"/pause 1500/move farmer -10 0 3 true/pause 2000/end invisible Emet-Selch
